name: Stickman Crime Death - Gas Station & Hotel Strategy Murder Game
name_original: Stickman Crime Death - Gas Station & Hotel Strategy Murder Game
description:
Kill all stickman like an accident at the gas station and hotel.
Create chaos with one deadly click.Find hidden objects or places on the screen,
press them and lead stickmen to the painful death.
The 'help' will help you do it fine within the time limit.
Remember the rule of Death, don't let one see another one die!Good Luck.
